div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 700 Mahmudia, c. 22 km. SE of Tulcea, Rumania, 1949 Burial: c. 450 B.C. Contents: 10 AR Istrus: dr. or st. (early) Disposition: Bucharest (Acad) 2; Con- stanta 2 Canarache, Ateliere monetare (Studii si referate privind istoria Rom√¢niei 1, Bucharest, 1954), p. 186; Pontice 1968, p. 136, illus.
